about.heading: About
about.parOne: I am a full-stack software engineer specialized in web development, backend architecture, and AI integration. I build scalable, high-performance applications using TypeScript, Node.js, Python, Docker, and Kubernetes focusing on clean APIs, robust CI/CD, and maintainable systems.
about.parTwo: Currently, I am developing a communication tool that will definitely feature AI to simplify everyday interactions using NLP processing and intelligent automation. Follow me closely, it will be great.
about.parThree: I have led systems handling 10,000+ ops per minute, refactored legacy stacks from Laravel to Kotlin, and integrated SAP HANA with real-time data. I've also helped scale teams through mentoring and motivational leadership, but I'm not a coach.
about.parFour: Outside of work hours, I'm usually playing bass, singing, or catching bugs on personal projects. Coffee fuels 'my code' and yes, dark mode is a lifestyle.
